content: gauge is 18 stitches x 18 row measured by counting all stitches the single crochets and the chain stitches you can use any type/brand of yarn adjust the number of stitches and row to your desired size i used bella baby pebble yarn in white 2 skeins finished size width 8″ 20 5cm length 50″ 127cm more details https //mycrochetspace com/crochet-moss-stitch-scarf/
